resources.string: Before starting the engine, ensure your seat and mirrors are properly adjusted. A comfortable and well-positioned seat, along with correctly adjusted mirrors, will enhance your visibility and control
Always wear your seatbelt and ensure that all passengers do the same. Seatbelts are crucial for your safety and the safety of others in the vehicle.

Familiarize yourself with the basic dashboard controls such as indicators, headlights, windshield wipers, and hazard lights. Knowing how to operate these controls will help you navigate different driving conditions.
Before starting the engine, ensure your seat and mirrors are properly adjusted. A comfortable and well-positioned seat, along with correctly adjusted mirrors, will enhance your visibility and control
